Posts.EditableText: Hi! I'm trying to make a ShowMenu list in my game, but I want to add an extra, secret easter egg option that will only appear by typing something, like "secret", into the type bar. Any ideas?
Posts.HTML: Hi! I'm trying to make a ShowMenu list in my game, but I want to add an extra, secret easter egg option that will only appear by typing something, like "secret", into the type bar. Any ideas?
